text: right|200px Abdul Wahab Dalimunthe (10 January 19398 November 2021) was an Indonesian politician. He was born in Rantau Prapat, North Sumatra, Indonesia. He was a member of the Golkar and Democratic Party. Dalimunthe was part of the People's Representative Council from 2009 until 2014 and again from 2017 until his death. Dalimunthe died on 8 November 2021 at a hospital in Medan, Indonesia at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Democratic Party (Indonesia) politicians
title: Abdul Wahab Dalimunthe
